OOC: Guys, please erase some of the older stuff on here. My computer is a q=
uick one, but it cannot withstand over 100 KB mails with music playing if P=
rodigy chooses to misbehave.

BIC: Arrow and Deemos go into the CR Chambers=
 as well. Arrow was a purple color, but Deemos was already a black and whit=
e back from the color change in his Mafia days...

  ----- Original Message=
 -----
  From: LurkerAbyss
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Friday, Aug=
ust 16, 2002 11:05 PM
  Subject: Re: nWo base


  : : Hollywood/Sting : :

=
  Hollywood turned to look at Diesel and Razor.

  Hollywood:  Oh, hey guys=
.  The ship has a lot of goodies.  On these disks, is every byte of data on=
 this computer, including a map of the whole Earth, and it maps the locatio=
ns of the transformer factions here too, and other stuff.  Right now brothe=
rs, I'm just checking the quality of the parts of the ship.  It could possi=
ble serve useful to attach it to our own base.

  Meanwhile, Sting comes ou=
t of his CR Chamber.  He was formerly black and white, and although it was =
fitting, not only did he get the logo, but all the white on him was replace=
d with red.  He sees that the entrance is open, and exits the base.  He the=
n sees that Diesel, Razor and Hollywood are inside the ship.  He walks in.
=

  Sting:  Oh,  hey guys.  What have you done here so far, Hollywood?

  Ho=
llywood:  Oh, nothing much brother, I've contained all the data stored on t=
he ship onto these disks, and I'm just taking a look at the equipment.

  -=
---------------------------------------------------------------------------=
----------
  The preceding announcement has been paid for by the 
  New Wor=
ld Order
